Good afternoon LinkedIn family!! I am currently in the process of conducting my Senior Capstone Research Project, with the guidance of Dr. Marisela Martinez-Cola, about the sentiments of African-American legal students (current students and graduates) attending Ivy League schools. I decided to do this research primarily because I plan on attending law school. I want to apply to law school for the Fall 2025 cycle and have my eye on various Ivy League institutions. So, I want to learn firsthand African-American law students' attitudes towards their institutions and how they are socialized in that space. Secondly, I want to do this research because hardly any studies focus specifically on African-American law students. I would like to offer research that details African-American law students' experiences, trials, and successes to the academic community. To achieve this goal and write a robust study, I need your help. Please disseminate the attached survey link and flyer to current African-American law students or graduates and encourage them to complete it. I would greatly appreciate your help and hope you decide to oblige my request. Feel free to reach out with any questions. Thank you! Survey Link: https://lnkd.in/earNWa6k #lawschool #studentresearch #MorehouseCollege
